FrontEnd

Class ProfessorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrontEnd.MainModel
      • FrontEnd.ProfessorModel

  • public class ProfessorModel
extends MainModel
    Provides methods to handle reading and writing objects to the database manager. Extends the main model.
    Since:
    April 13, 2018
    Version:
    1.0
